Activity: Check emails, respond to any urgent requests. Review calendar for any scheduled meetings.
Continue refining the requirements document based on feedback from yesterday's activities. Pay close attention to the sections related to data validation and error handling.
Focus on the section about integration with other hospital systems (e.g., lab information system, pharmacy system). Ensure seamless data exchange between systems.
Create mockups of the UI changes to illustrate the proposed modifications to the EHR system. Visual aids can help stakeholders understand the impact of the changes.
Lunch Break. Read a tech article about Kubernetes.
Prepare for the meeting with the EHR vendor. Review the requirements document thoroughly and identify potential challenges or questions.

EHR Vendor Consultation Meeting with @ehrv-1. Discuss the technical feasibility, cost, and timeline for implementing the required EHR system updates or modifications. Take detailed notes of the discussion.
Document all the action items from the vendor consultation meeting. Send a follow-up email to @ehrv-1 to confirm the next steps. Shut down for the day.
